channel.title: math.GR updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GR updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Network right * abundant semigroups
item.description: arXiv:2411.14897v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We introduce the class of network right $*$-abundant semigroups. These are based on networks that extend the notion of a directed graph. This class properly contains the class of graph inverse semigroups. We investigate the structure of network right $*$-abundant semigroups. We show that two network right $*$-abundant semigroups are isomorphic if and only if the underlying networks are isomorphic.
item.dc:creator: Yanhui Wang, Pei Gao, Xueming Ren

item.title: On the analog category of finite groups
item.description: arXiv:2411.14958v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We show that, up to small error, the analog category of a finite group records the size of its largest Sylow subgroup.
item.dc:creator: Ben Knudsen, Shmuel Weinberger
